binance 0.0.4

    Order book

    market_order_book.Rd

    Exposes the GET /api/v3/depth endpoint.

    market_order_book(symbol, side = NULL, limit = 100)

    Arguments

    symbol

    Symbol.

    side

    Side of the trade: "BUY" or "SELL".

    limit

    Maximum number of records in result. Default is 100 and maximum is 5000.

    Value

    A data frame.

    Examples

    market_order_book("BTCUSDT")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>   symbol  last_update_id bids              asks              
#>   <chr>            <int> <list>            <list>            
#> 1 BTCUSDT        2591840 <tibble [80 × 2]> <tibble [100 × 2]>
market_order_book(c("BTCUSDT", "TRXUSDT"))
#> # A tibble: 2 × 4
#>   symbol  last_update_id bids              asks              
#>   <chr>            <int> <list>            <list>            
#> 1 BTCUSDT        2591844 <tibble [80 × 2]> <tibble [100 × 2]>
#> 2 TRXUSDT            280 <tibble [0 × 2]>  <tibble [1 × 2]>
